DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate whether selonsertib ( SEL ; GS-4997 ) cause fibrosis regression reduce progression cirrhosis associate complication adult NASH bridging ( F3 ) fibrosis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Selonsertib Adults With Nonalcoholic Steatohepatitis ( NASH ) Bridging ( F3 ) Fibrosis
DOC.criteria: Key Liver biopsy consistent NASH bridging ( F3 fibrosis ) accord NASH CRN classification opinion central reader Has follow laboratory parameter screen visit : Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) ≤ 8 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) Creatinine Clearance ( CLcr ) ≥ 30 milliliter/minute ( mL/min ) , calculate CockcroftGault equation Hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) < 9.5 % Total bilirubin ≤ 1.5 x ULN Key Prior history decompensated liver disease include ascites , hepatic encephalopathy ( HE ) , variceal bleeding ChildPugh ( CP ) score > 6 , determine screen Model Endstage Liver Disease ( MELD ) score > 12 , determine screen Other cause liver disease include , limited , alcoholic liver disease , hepatitis B , hepatitis C , autoimmune disorder , druginduced hepatotoxicity , Wilson disease , iron overload , alpha1antitryspin deficiency , base medical history centralize review liver histology . History liver transplantation Current history hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) Note : Other protocol define Inclusion/Exclusion criterion may apply .
